name: Gankutsuou: The Count of Monte Cristo

quotes.quote: If people could become friends simply by sharing bread and salt, life would be simpler.
As far as I'm concerned, I think I'd rather know the truth. Even if learning the truth changed who I am.
Everyone has a sword within their hearts; the purer the heart, the sharper the sword.

I no longer even dream, for I no longer sleep. So I had this golden enclosed garden made. However, now the only place where I can be myself is in this room. And my wealth is just this one glass of water.
